cgcloud__CP_Pricing_Condition__c.name: cgcloud__CP_Pricing_Condition__c
cgcloud__CP_Pricing_Condition__c.description: This object holds the details of the pricing condition object that the Penny Perfect Pricing functionality uses.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Account_Set__c.description: Reference to the customer set object.

cgcloud__Content_Hash__c.description: The Content Hash to identify the changes made to the Content field.

cgcloud__Content__c.description: XML structure with aggregated condition information.

cgcloud__Deleted__c.description: Specifies whether a pricing condition has been deleted by the complex pricing batch.

cgcloud__Key_Type__c.description: Reference to the key type object.

cgcloud__Merged_Key__c.description: Merged key of all key attributes that the key type defines.

cgcloud__Pricing_Condition_Template__c.description: Reference to the pricing condition template.

cgcloud__Product_Assortment__c.description: Reference to the product assortment object.

cgcloud__Replication_Key_Id__c.description: ID or value of the record that the staging replication key defines.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the pricing condition belongs.

cgcloud__Unique_Key__c.description: Key that's used for the upsert process.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Start period of all conditions that are merged into this condition (earliest one).

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: End period of all conditions that are merged into this condition (oldest one).
